attributes.action: Stop foreign ownership of freehold residential property in UK.
attributes.additional_details:
Speculators, both domestic and foreign, are the cause of the housing crisis in the UK. There's no shortage of houses, they are simply stock piled by investors as a long term investments, often kept empty.

If people want to speculate on property there are many options Inc retail, commercial, industrial, hospitality etc. 

It's wrong that young people can't buy a house because someone else has two.
attributes.background:
1. Stop foreign ownership of freehold residential property in UK. No domicile, no ownership.
2. Stop ownership of more than one residential property in UK, i.e. second homes.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

The Government is not responsible for how many properties a person owns. It is up to homeowners to decide who to sell their home to.
